label: current
subject: Hello
body:
p Hello #{fullname}
p You last logged into PINGR on #{last_login}, so we thought we'd let you know how #{practiceName} is doing. Remember, you can log directly into #[a(href='#{pingrUrl}') PINGR] for more detail, including:
ul
  li Lists of patients not achieving each quality indicator
  li Suggested improvement actions for these patients, and for #{practiceName} in general
  li Comparison of your performance with other practices in Salford
ul
p #{practiceName}'s current performance is:
table
  thead(style='font-weight:bold')
    tr(style='font-weight:bold')
      th Indicator
      th Current Performance
      th Number of Patients
      th Target
      th Salford Benchmark
  tbody
    for indicator in indicators
      tr
        td= indicator.name
        td= indicator.performance
        td= indicator.fraction
        td= indicator.target
        td= indicator.benchmark
p We only send you emails if you haven't visited PINGR for two weeks. If you wish to stop receiving them please visit #[a(href='#{pingrUrl}') PINGR] and update your email preferences.
p The PINGR team
p
  strong Tip: 
  | If youâ€™re having trouble accessing PINGR: open Google Chrome, copy PINGR's address (#{pingrUrl}) and paste it into the address bar at the top. If you're still having problems accessing PINGR, please email benjamin.brown@manchester.ac.uk for help.

label: patient focused
subject: 5 of your patients not meeting NICE guidelines
body:
p Hi #{fullname}
p 
  a(href='#{pingrUrl}') PINGR
  |  has identified 5 of 
  strong(style="font-style:italic") your 
  | patients not meeting 
  strong 3 or more 
  | NICE quality standards. Here are their NHS numbers:
table
  tbody
    for patient in patients.slice(0,5)
      tr
        td
          a(href='#{pingrUrl}#patient/#{patient._id}')= patient.nhsNumber
p
  | Log into PINGR 
  a(href='#{pingrUrl}#patient') now 
  | to treat 
  strong(style="font-style:italic") your 
  | patients.
p(style="margin-bottom:2px")
  strong Short on time?
ol(style="Margin-top:0px;")
  li(style="Margin-top: 0;") Forward this email to a member of your team for them to action (e.g. a nurse or GP).
  li Forward this email to your secretary or practice manager; ask them to book a slot in your calendar to look at PINGR.
  li Schedule a slot in your calendar yourself to look at PINGR.
p(style="margin-bottom:2px") Best wishes,
p(style="margin-top:4px") Dr Benjamin Brown
p(style="margin-bottom:2px")
  strong Problems? 
p(style="margin-top:2px")
  | To access PINGR copy this address (
  a(href="#{pingrUrl}") #{pingrUrlWithoutTracking} 
  | ) into your web browser. You can change your email settings 
  a(href="#{pingrUrl}emailpreference") here
  | . For further help email 
  a(href="mailto:#{reminderEmailsFrom}") #{reminderEmailsFrom}
  | .

label: patient focused v2
subject: 5 of your patients not meeting NICE guidelines
body:
p Hi #{fullname}
p 
  | PINGR  has identified 5 of 
  strong(style="font-style:italic") your 
  | patients not meeting 
  strong 3 or more 
  | NICE quality standards. Here are their NHS numbers:
table
  tbody
    for patient in patients.slice(0,5)
      tr
        td #{patient.nhsNumber}
p
  strong(style="font-style:italic") Copy this address #{pingrUrlWithoutTracking}#patients into your web browser to view these patients in PINGR.
p(style="margin-bottom:2px")
  strong Short on time?
ol(style="Margin-top:0px;")
  li(style="Margin-top: 0;") Forward this email to a member of your team for them to action (e.g. a nurse or GP).
  li Forward this email to your secretary or practice manager; ask them to book a slot in your calendar to look at PINGR.
  li Schedule a slot in your calendar yourself to look at PINGR.
p(style="margin-bottom:2px") Best wishes,
p(style="margin-top:4px") Dr Benjamin Brown
p(style="margin-bottom:2px")
  strong Problems? 
p(style="margin-top:2px")
  | For further help email 
  a(href="mailto:#{reminderEmailsFrom}") #{reminderEmailsFrom}
  | . You can change your email settings at #{pingrUrlWithoutTracking}emailpreference.

label: patient focused v3
subject: 5 of your patients not meeting NICE guidelines
body:
p #{greeting} #{fullname}
if patients.length===0
  p All the patients in your practice are meeting the NICE quality standards that you have expressed an interested in. 
  p Well done! 
else
  p 
    | PINGR  has identified 
    = Math.min(patients.length,5)
    |  of 
    strong your 
    | patients not meeting 
    strong= patients[Math.min(patients.length-1,4)].indicators.length + " or more "
    | NICE quality standards. Their NHS numbers and relevant quality standards are at the bottom of this email.
  p
    strong(style="font-style:italic") We recommend viewing these patients in PINGR rather than #{practiceSystem}, because the alerts in #{practiceSystem} are based on QOF (not NICE guidelines). To view these patients in PINGR, copy this address #{pingrUrlWithoutTracking}#patients into your web browser.
  p(style="margin-bottom:2px")
    strong Short on time?
  ol(style="Margin-top:0px;")
    li(style="Margin-top: 0;") Forward this email to a member of your team for them to action (e.g. a nurse or GP).
    li Forward this email to your secretary or practice manager; ask them to book a slot in your calendar to look at PINGR.
    li Schedule a slot in your calendar yourself to look at PINGR.
p(style="margin-bottom:2px")
  strong Problems? 
p(style="margin-top:2px")
  | For further help email 
  a(href="mailto:#{reminderEmailsFrom}") #{reminderEmailsFrom}
  | . You can change your email settings at #{pingrUrlWithoutTracking}emailpreference.
p(style="margin-bottom:2px") Best wishes,
p(style="margin-top:4px") Dr Benjamin Brown
if patients.length > 0
  p(style="margin-top:34px")
    strong(style="text-decoration:underline") PATIENTS
  table
    tbody
      for patient in patients.slice(0,5)
        tr
          td(style="Padding-bottom:12px")
            div
              strong #{patient.nhsNumber}
            for i in patient.indicators
              div= i

label: patient focused v4
subject: 5 patients not meeting NICE guidelines
body:
p #{greeting} #{fullname}
if patients.length===0
  p All the patients in your practice are meeting the NICE quality standards that you have expressed an interested in. 
  p Well done! 
else
  p 
    | PINGR  has identified 
    strong= Math.min(patients.length,5) + " of your "
    | patients not meeting 
    strong= patients[Math.min(patients.length-1,4)].indicators.length + " or more "
    | NICE quality standards (see below).
  p(style="font-style:italic")
    strong
      | We recommend viewing these patients in PINGR here: 
      br
      | #{pingrUrlWithoutTracking}#patients
    br
    | (Don't use #{practiceSystem}, because it uses QOF not NICE guidelines).
  p(style="margin-bottom:2px")
    strong Short on time?
  ol(style="Margin-top:0px;")
    li(style="Margin-top: 0;") Forward this email to someone else to action (e.g. a nurse or admin staff).
    li Schedule a slot in your calendar to look at PINGR (e.g. during your admin time).
    li Forward this email to your secretary/practice manager; ask them to book a slot in your appointments to look at PINGR.
p(style="margin-bottom:2px") Best wishes,
p(style="margin-top:4px") Dr Benjamin Brown
p(style="margin-bottom:2px") 
  | PS: You can view/change your email settings here (e.g. the indicators and types of patients you are emailed about): 
  br
  | #{pingrUrlWithoutTracking}emailpreference.
if patients.length > 0
  p(style="margin-top:34px")
    strong(style="text-decoration:underline") PATIENTS
  table
    tbody
      for patient in patients.slice(0,5)
        tr
          td(style="Padding-bottom:12px")
            div
              strong #{patient.nhsNumber}
            for i in patient.indicators
              div= i
